Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillborough Way, between the Hospital and the Fighting Academy.
Room.LongDescription: Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighting Techniques is located on the south side of the road, offering advanced courses in fighting strategy for high level fighters only. On the north side of the road is the Oceancrest Caretaking Facility for the Mortally Wounded, a sort of hospital for the badly injured.
